---
title: "Pull Requests"
---

## How to create a Pull Request on GitHub

1.  Find the repository that you want to make changes to

2.  Click the "Fork" button in the upper right

3.  Give your new fork a repository name

4.  Open a new project in RStudio

5.  Click the git pane and then create a new branch

6.  Make changes to the code, then make a commit and push it to github

7.  On GitHub a yellow box will appear with a green box inside of it that says "Compare & pull request"

8.  Then you will add a title and description for the pull request, then click "Create pull request"
